description:
Sara, a mysterious woman, appears before Sara. Sara was once saved by Sesshomaru. She was reincarnated just as she had died from an illness. She has stolen Inuyasha`s Tessaiga, and turned Miroku and Sango into glass statues.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Die Frau, die Sesshoumaru liebte – Teil 2
La mujer que se enamora de Sesshōmaru (2º parte)
The Woman Who Loved Sesshoumaru, Part 2
殺生丸を愛した女 (後編)
